body.name: Britax Willow Grove SC Baby Travel System, Infant Car Seat and Stroller Combo with Alpine Base, ClickTight Technology, SafeWash, Pindot Iris
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 27 mins
features: Infant Car Seat and Stroller Combo: The Britax Willow Grove SC baby travel system includes the Willow SC infant car seat, Alpine car seat base, and Grove baby stroller
Install Confidently: Britax is the only brand with ClickTight technology, so you know it can be installed securely on the first ride and beyond
Find the Perfect Fit: The rear-facing car seat features the RightSize system, which provides adjustment points at the hips, shoulders, and between the legs to help you find the perfect fit
Six Ways to Ride: The Grove stroller is suitable for children from birth up to 50 lbs with options for baby mode, toddler mode, and infant mode when paired with the Willow SC car seat
Room to Grow: CozyFit insert allows baby to ride in the stroller seat from 10 pounds and can be removed to accommodate children up to 50 pounds
Move Smooth, Stroll Steady: This lightweight stroller features all-wheel suspension and tough, no-flat tires
Sun Protection: The infant travel system provides a UPF 50+ canopy with a flip-down sunshade for comfortable cruising on sunny or rainy days
Extra Room for Essentials: This Britax stroller has an extra-large cargo area and 5 additional pockets to keep your valuables, drinks, and other must-haves handy
Base-Free Stability: An extra belt path on the back of the seat offers added security when installing without the base
SafeWash Car Seat Cover: The car seat comes with a washer and dryer-friendly cover for quick and easy cleanup
body.description: Make every moment effortless with the Britax Willow Grove™ SC baby travel system. This infant car seat and stroller combo includes the Britax Willow™ SC infant car seat, Alpine™ car seat base and Grove™ modular stroller. First ride jitters? Gone. Britax is the only brand with ClickTight® technology, so you know it can be installed securely on the first ride and beyond. The RightSize™ system provides adjustment points at the hips, shoulders, and legs to help you find the perfect fit. The ReboundReduce™ Stability Bar on the Alpine car seat base helps minimize movement in a crash for peace of mind while you’re on the move. When it's time to cruise, attach the car seat to the Grove baby stroller and take on the town. Made for children up to 50 lbs, the Grove baby stroller features 6 different strolling positions—including both parent-facing and forward-facing—so your child can look up at you or out to the world. The washable CozyFit™ insert allows babies as small as 10 lbs to ride in this toddler stroller when the seat is fully reclined. The Grove stroller comes with an extra-large cargo basket plus 5 additional pockets for valuables, drinks, and your little one's must-haves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality and material of this are great. I love that this infant car seat has a higher height limit and is lighter than the one I’m replacing because it’s expired. It feels more spacious and comfortable. I’m not sure I’ll use the balance bar though. I like how smooth the stroller is and think it takes just a bit of practice to open/close quickly because it feels like you need to remember to do multiple things simultaneously. The price point of this system is expensive but overall I do like this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am so impressed with the full set. The quality is great and it’s the whole travel system in one. Its the travel system that will go long way with the child’s growth as you can switch it from baby mode to toddler mode easily… the bottom basket is pretty wide and can easily fit a baby bag along with other baby accessories… the seats are soft and made of high quality material. The canopy is pretty large and gives a good coverage to the baby. Also comes with a peek a boo Window on canopy. I like how easy it is to fold and unfold this stroller from just one hand. It also comes with the car seat. The wheels runs smoothly in all types of terrain. I am very happy and satisfied with this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super nice but pricey
reviews.reviewText: This stroller and carrier combo is very easy to use. It is very well crafted out of really good material and it feels extremely comfortable. It is not hard to use the straps security features like it is on carriers. The stroller feels very comfortable to push and the wheels glide seamlessly.. overall I would say this stroller is definitely a high-quality class act. It is a five star in quality stroller, but it is priced a little bit too high in comparison to its competitors that offer the same features. I hate deducting a star of price, but it would not be a fair review unless I did so. if the price is about 15% lower this would be a full five star product
